headline: 5 Low Price-to-Book Stocks to Buy as 2025 Comes to a Close
summary: AES, BWA, ENS, PCG and KROS screen as low P/B stocks with Buy ratings, offering value-focused opportunities as 2025 comes to a close.

headline: FE to Benefit From Infrastructure Upgradation & Grid Modernization
summary: FE is ramping up grid modernization and regulated investments as AI-driven data centers continue to drive demand.

headline: American Electric's Investments and Renewables Fuel Long-Term Growth
summary: AEP's $72B capital plan and renewable buildout aim to lift efficiency and revenues, but reliance on a few REPs poses cash-flow risk.
